title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

KA.AQWE.content: Kant against the program: guardians keeping man from other further enlightenment

KA.EP.content: nature keeps man apart w/ language & religion > spirit of commerce, POWER OF MONEY, prevents war > certainty of eternal peace makes it one’s duty to work toward this state [but? p. 454]
